List R releases in the CRANDB database

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R
cran_releases.Rd

List R releases in the CRANDB database

cran_releases()

Value

List of R releases.

Examples

cran_releases()
#> R releases---------------------------------------------------------------------
#>  Version Date      
#>  2.0.0   2004-10-04
#>  2.0.1   2004-11-15
#>  2.1.0   2005-04-18
#>  2.1.1   2005-06-20
#>  2.2.0   2005-10-06
#>  2.2.1   2005-12-20
#>  2.3.0   2006-04-24
#>  2.3.1   2006-06-01
#>  2.4.0   2006-10-03
#>  2.4.1   2006-12-18
#>  2.5.0   2007-04-24
#>  2.5.1   2007-06-28
#>  2.6.0   2007-10-03
#>  2.6.1   2007-11-26
#>  2.6.2   2008-02-08

#>  2.7.2   2008-08-25
#>  2.8.0   2008-10-20
#>  2.8.1   2008-12-22
